BNL Mets/Alto importer¶

This importer extends the generic Mets/Alto importer, and it was developed to handle OCR newspaper data provided by the BNL.

Custom classes¶

class text_importer.importers.lux.classes.LuxNewspaperIssue(issue_dir: impresso_commons.path.path_fs.IssueDirectory)¶
class text_importer.importers.lux.classes.LuxNewspaperPage(_id: str, n: int, filename: str, basedir: str)¶

Class representing a page in BNL data.

add_issue(issue: text_importer.importers.mets_alto.classes.MetsAltoNewPaperIssue)¶

Add to a page object its parent, i.e. the newspaper issue.

This allows each page to preserve contextual information coming from the newspaper issue.

Parameters

issue (NewspaperIssue) – Newspaper issue contaning this page.

Detect functions¶

text_importer.importers.lux.detect.LuxIssueDir¶

alias of text_importer.importers.lux.detect.IssueDirectory

text_importer.importers.lux.detect.detect_issues(base_dir: str, access_rights: str = None) → List[text_importer.importers.lux.detect.IssueDirectory]¶

Parse a directory structure and detect newspaper issues to be imported.

Parameters

  • access_rights –

  • base_dir (LuxIssueDir) – the root of the directory structure

Returns

list of LuxIssueDir instances

Return type

list

Create a LuxIssueDir object from a directory.

Helper methods¶

text_importer.importers.lux.helpers.convert_coordinates(hpos, vpos, width, height, x_res, y_res)¶

x = (coordinate[‘xResolution’]/254.0) * coordinate[‘hpos’]

y = (coordinate[‘yResolution’]/254.0) * coordinate[‘vpos’]

w = (coordinate[‘xResolution’]/254.0) * coordinate[‘width’]

h = (coordinate[‘yResolution’]/254.0) * coordinate[‘height’]

text_importer.importers.lux.helpers.encode_ark(ark)¶

Replaces (encodes) backslashes in the Ark identifier.
